Name: Lyons Thumb
Details: A disputed region within a disputed region, the Lyons Thumb is a group of worlds in the Chaos March coreward of Terra. Claimed by Archon Katrina Steiner-Davion on behalf of the newly formed Lyran Alliance but extending into the Draconis Combine, the future of the Lyons Thumb is even more uncertain than the rest of the Chaos March.
